params.maturityID: timestamp in which maturity pool matures
params.pool: maturity pool that needs to be updated

params.fee: fee to be added to the earnings for                   the pool at maturity
params.pool: maturity pool that needs to be updated

params.amount: amount to be added to the maturity pool
params.pool: maturity pool where money will be added

params.amount: amount to be added to the maturity pool
params.pool: maturity pool where money will be added

returns.earningsRepay: : amount to distribute as earnings to the SP - extras (penalties,         not shared with anyone)
returns.fee: : amount to distribute as earnings to the SP (revenue share with protocol)
returns.smartPoolDebtReduction: : amount to reduce the SP debt

params.fee: fee to be added to the earnings for                   the pool at maturity
params.pool: maturity pool that needs to be updated

params.amount: amount to be taken out of the pool before it matures
params.pool: maturity pool where money needs to be taken out

returns.newDebtSP: amount of new debt that needs to be taken out of the SP

accrueEarningsToSP(PoolLib.MaturityPool.notice: External function to accrue Smart Pool earnings

addFee(PoolLib.MaturityPool storage,uint.notice: External function to add fee to be collected at maturity

addMoney(PoolLib.MaturityPool storage,ui.notice: function that registers an operation to add money to         maturity pool

repay(PoolLib.MaturityPool storage,uint2.notice: function that registers an operation to repay to         maturity pool. Reduces the amount of supplied amount by         MP depositors, after that reduces SP debt, and finally         returns the amount of earnings to pay to SP

takeFee(PoolLib.MaturityPool storage,uin.notice: External function to take a fee out of earnings at maturity

takeMoney(PoolLib.MaturityPool storage,u.notice: function that registers an operation to take money out of the         maturity pool that returns if there's new debt to be taken out         of the smart pool
